Package engine.tiles

Class Atlas

java.lang.Object
engine.tiles.Atlas
public class Atlas extends Object
Atlas reading a spriteSheet and bining each sprite to an integer key

  • Constructor Details

    • Atlas

      public Atlas(String spriteSheetURL, int spriteSize, int rows, int cols, int scaleFactor)
      Creates an atlas that binds an integer to a sprite from a spriteSheet
      Parameters:
      spriteSheetURL - Path to the sprite sheet
      spriteSize - Size of a sprite in the spriteSheet
      rows - Number of sprite in a row
      cols - Number of sprite in a column
      scaleFactor - Scale factor of the atlas's sprites

    • Atlas

      cols - Number of sprite in a column
